chat_history.content:
Let me compile the information about the seven largest islands and their capital cities:

1. Greenland - Capital: Nuuk
2. New Guinea - Has two parts:
   - Papua New Guinea (eastern part) - Capital: Port Moresby
   - Indonesian Papua (western part) - Capital: Jayapura

chat_history.content:
3. Borneo - Divided between three countries:
   - Indonesian part (Kalimantan) - Various provincial capitals
   - Malaysian part (Sabah and Sarawak) - Capitals: Kota Kinabalu (Sabah) and Kuching (Sarawak)
   - Brunei - Capital: Bandar Seri Begawan

7. Honshu - Contains Tokyo, the capital of Japan

Here's the complete list of the seven largest islands in the world and their capital/main cities:

1. Greenland - Nuuk
2. New Guinea - Port Moresby (Papua New Guinea, east) and Jayapura (Indonesian Papua, west)
3. Borneo - Shared between three countries with main cities Bandar Seri Begawan (Brunei), Kota Kinabalu (Malaysian Sabah), Kuching (Malaysian Sarawak), and various provincial capitals in Indonesian Kalimantan
4. Madagascar - Antananarivo
5. Baffin Island - Iqaluit
6. Sumatra - Medan
7. Honshu - Tokyo
